pages.text: This category of blocks create a butterfly, which wanders around and pollinates a type of block.
pages.title: Butterfly Boxes

pages.text: Each block creates one butterfly, and only when that butterfly dies, will it create a new one.$(br2)Each butterfly lasts for 5 minutes before expiring. The butterfly box will create a new butterfly at this point.
This box creates butterflies that seek out crops to grow.
This box creates butterflies that converts dirt to grass.
This box creates butterflies that seek out saplings to grow.
